mapper.select: SELECT t.TEST_PAPER_ID, t.TEST_PAPER_TITLE, t.COURSE_TYPE_ID, t.TEST_PAPER_TYPE, t.TEST_PAPER_DIFFICULTY, t.TEST_QUESTION_SOURCE, t.TEST_QUESTION_NUM, t.TEST_PAPER_SCORE, t.ANSWER_TIME, t.TEST_CHANCE, t.QUALIFIED_SCORE, t.STATE, t.CREATE_USER, t.CREATE_DATE, t.TEST_QUESTION_ID, d.TEST_QUESTION_TITLE, d.COURSE_TYPE_ID, d.TEST_QUESTION_TYPE, d.TEST_QUESTION_DIFFICULTY, d.TEST_QUESTION_SCORE, d.TEST_QUESTION_ANSWER, d.TEST_ANSWER_NOTE FROM (SELECT a.*,b.TEST_QUESTION_ID FROM tb_test_paper a, tb_test_paper_detail b WHERE a.TEST_PAPER_ID = b.TEST_PAPER_ID) AS t LEFT JOIN tb_test_question d ON t.TEST_QUESTION_ID = d.TEST_QUESTION_ID AND T.TEST_PAPER_ID=#{pd.TEST_PAPER_ID} ORDER BY d.TEST_QUESTION_TYPE, T.TEST_QUESTION_ID
